means: 将（手臂等）靠在某人（某物）上( repose的现在分词 )

list.abs: reposefully 平稳地reposing room 太平间reposit in 保存
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... reposal 信赖 repose on 座落于 repose 休息.
石油词汇英语翻译(QR)--石油百科 ... report 报告 repose angle 静止角 repose period 静止期.
repose angle 静止角repose period 静止期repose 静止

entry.def: Repose is a state in which you are resting and feeling calm.

example.ex: He had a still, almost blank face in repose...
example.tran: 他休息时面部平静，几乎毫无表情。

example.ex: Its atmosphere is one of repose rather than excitement.
example.tran: 那里气氛安宁而不热闹。

entry.def: If something reposes somewhere, it is there.

example.ex: Exquisite china soup dishes reposed on silver plates.
example.tran: 银盘子上面摆放着精制的陶瓷汤盘。

auth_sentence.content: He nodded at a manilla file reposing on his otherwise immaculate desk.
auth_sentence.res_content: He nodded at a manilla file reposing on his otherwise immaculate desk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He nodded at a manilla file reposing on his otherwise immaculate desk.

auth_sentence.content: But here, now, reposing in his arms, weighing next to nothing but changing everything, is the second.
auth_sentence.res_content: But here, now, reposing in his arms, weighing next to nothing but changing everything, is the second.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But here, now, reposing in his arms, weighing next to nothing but changing everything, is the second.
